name: simON-reads
description: simON-reads (Simulate Oxford Nanopore Reads) is a simple yet powerful tool to generate fastq files containing MiniON-like long reads

name: Word-Doc-2-HTML
description: Python Desktop application to convert Word Documents to HTML - based on mammoth-python

name: altrevis
description: An easy-to-use, beginner-oriented tool to align DNA/RNA or protein sequences, infer an approximately Maximum Likelihood phylogenetic tree from the alignment and visualize it

name: PredGenesGetPepts
description: PredGenesGetPepts is an easy-to-use, beginner-friendly pipeline to call genes from fasta files, retrieve peptides and blasting them against a given protein database
